imageText: From training to launch to landing, this all-access docuseries rides along with the Inspiration4 crew on the first all-civilian orbital space ...

I was not pumping out the quality that I should have, Lawrence told Vanity Fair in 2021 about films like Passengers that led her to step away from the spotlight. I just think everybody had gotten sick of me.
